DOC.brief_title: Chronic Low Back Pain Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: The study employ two arm parallel group stratify control trial . A total 60 subject 18 64 year old low back pain least half day previous 6 month recruit Wilton Family YMCA participate study . The participant within recruitment cohort randomize sub-investigator statistician two treatment arm ratio 1:1 ( stretch exercise experimental arm : self-care book active comparator arm ) . Three cohort 10 subject receive intervention stretch exercise program Wilton Family YMCA January 2015 October 2015 . The stretching exercise program consist 12 standardized weekly stretching exercise session incrementally increase duration 15-30 minute . Participants receive stretch exercise intervention ask practice identical stretch class non-class day give handout companion CD assist . Thirty control subject receive self-care book . All analysis conduct assume intent-to-treat principle use SAS statistical software . All P value 95 % CIs 2-sided statistical significance P = 0.05 value .
DOC.criteria: Adults 18 64 year old low back pain least half day previous 6 month We exclude person whose back pain attribute systemic specific disease know cancer , spinal infection , fracture , ankylose spondylitis . Patients complex condition participate study ( eg , sciatica , medicolegal issue , previous back surgery ) . We also exclude person speak English . Finally , person unable attend class unwilling home practice exclude .
